characterDescription:
Riino is a member of the Ire* who is on Roshar because he is just one amongst them who is interested in that world.
In Shadesmar, Riino had food and supplies for trade, though they would cost Kaladin, Shallan, Adolin, and Azure infused spheres.
They seek him out as a supposed fortune-teller who indicates to Kaladin that the very best readings happen at the beginning of a highstorm.
